typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		transaction_id as long,
		cust_id as integer,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as short,
		prod_cat_code as short,
		Qty as short,
		Rate as short,
		Tax as double,
		total_amt as double,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 0) ~> Transacation
source(output(
		D_KEY as integer,
		customer_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select D_KEY,customer_Id from D_customer',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> lkpcustomer
source(output(
		Src_Tab as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select [Src_Tab],[Watermark_Value] from config',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> incremental
Transacation derive(tran_date = toTimestamp(tran_date,'dd-MM-yyyy'),
		source_tablename = 'Transactions') ~> datatypechange
incrementaljoin, lkpcustomer lookup(cust_id == customer_Id,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcustomer
datatypechange, incremental join(source_tablename == Src_Tab,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> incrementaljoin
Lookupcustomer filter(tran_date > Watermark_Value) ~> Filterdata
Filterdata sink(input(
		Transaction_key as integer,
		customer_Key as integer,
		transaction_id as integer,
		tran_date as date,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as integer,
		Tax as integer,
		total_amt as integer,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> transaction
